description: Main source file for a Flutter-based finance tracking app. Contains the entry point, theme setup, and primary widget hierarchy including authentication flow, dashboard, transaction management, budgets, and analytics screens.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring theme and initial route.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Handles authentication state and routes to login/register or main app.

classes.name: _AuthNavigationState
classes.description: State management for AuthNavigation, maintains authentication and view toggles.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main application shell with bottom navigation for Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, Charts.

classes.name: _MainScaffoldState
classes.description: State for MainScaffold, manages current selected tab and navigation actions.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Login UI component with authentication logic.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: Stateful logic for login screen including form handling.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Registration UI component with form and validation logic.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State management for registration including async registration logic.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions, summary card, and navigation to add transactions.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State for fetching and rendering dashboard data.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Transaction list with CRUD capabilities and deletion confirmation.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: State management for fetching, updating, and deleting transactions.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for adding or editing transactions with date picker and validation.

classes.name: _TransactionEditScreenState
classes.description: State for managing transaction form inputs and submission.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Displays categorized budgets and their current spending.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: Fetches budget data and renders budget cards.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Shows analytics such as spending breakdown with pie charts.

classes.name: _ChartsScreenState
classes.description: Fetches analytics data and visualizes with charts.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Overrides in various widgets to construct UI.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs out user and updates state.

methods.name: _fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches transaction list for transactions view.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker and updates selected date.
